com.splout.db.common
Interface ISQLiteManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLite4JavaManager, SQLiteJDBCManager
public interface ISQLiteManager

Contract for implementing several SQL interfaces. We have implemented two for SQLite and we finally use only one in production. This interface may be removed in the future.
